question: Which state secured the top position in the public affairs index(PAL)?
explanation: Kerala tops the first position in public affairs index (PAI) in governance in States. Tamil Nadu ranks 2 on the PAI whereas Bihar is last in public affairs index. The Public Affairs Index (PAI) is an attempt to bring together the states of the country which are culturally, economically and socially diverse, into a common data-driven framework, to facilitate an interstate comparison.
